last_episode_to_air.name: Wrath of the Fire Goddess
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers experience unimaginable terror as they investigate the town of Hilo, Hawaii. Voices in underground lava tubes warn of impending danger on the Big Island, giving the team a new respect for the vengeful fire goddess Pele.

name: Haunted Towns
overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers (TWC) expand their paranormal mission in "Haunted Towns" as they investigate local hauntings across America.

episodes.name: Gettysburg, PA
episodes.overview: The TWC investigates legendary Gettysburg, Pennsylvania, site of the bloodiest battle of the Civil War. While making contact with the restless souls of these fallen American soldiers, do they get more than they bargained for?

episodes.name: Salem, MA
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers head up to Salem, Massachusetts, to investigate the infamous Salem witch trials and figure out once and for all why spirits continue to haunt this quaint New England town 300 years after the witch trials took place!

episodes.name: Savannah, GA
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers are in Georgia's oldest city to investigate hauntings that surround Savannah's "Hanging Square." From war to murder to plague, Wright Square has been the epicenter of Savannah's paranormal activity for over 300 years!

episodes.name: Vicksburg, MS
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers head down to Mississippi, site of one of the Civil War's bloodiest battles: the 47-day Siege of Vicksburg. Can the TWC settle the restless spirit of the first civilian killed during this river town's Reconstruction Era?

episodes.name: Bisbee, AZ
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers head to one of America's most prolific mining towns: Bisbee, Arizona. With thousands of miles of spooky mining tunnels to explore in the "Queen of the Copper Camps," can the TWC find a connection between copper & ghosts?

episodes.name: Cape May, NJ
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers visit Cape May, New Jersey. Following the Civil War, did locals in this beach town with a penchant for seances, spirit boards, and Spiritualism open a paranormal portal on the Jersey Shore that remains open to this day?

episodes.name: Fall River, MA
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers head up to Fall River, Massachusetts, and the site of one of America's greatest unsolved murder mysteries. Long before O.J. Simpson, did Lizzie Borden take an ax and commit the crime of the (19th) century or not?

episodes.name: McDonough, GA
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers investigate a spooky looking doll named Claire to see if she is the cause of the evil surrounding one of the deadliest train crashes in American history.

episodes.name: Voodoo on the Bayou
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers head down to Louisiana’s paranormally charged Manchac Swamp. They’re the first team ever to investigate the site of America’s largest slave revolt, and they want to find out what's stirring up spirits over 200 years later.

episodes.name: Ghosts of the Gallows
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers encounter the spirits of two infamous murderers at the Old Idaho Penitentiary. They follow the trail of one murder into Boise, where the afterlife itself reveals shocking details about the victim, crime and killer.

episodes.name: Phantoms of the Frontier
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers head to the "Gateway to the West” to face the spirits of madmen and murderers as they try to uncover what’s behind the aggressive hauntings that have been terrorizing the citizens of Independence, Missouri.

episodes.name: Wraith Revenge
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers head to Wyoming to investigate a former frontier town infamous for the botched hanging of one of its most notorious criminals. Some believe the Wild West outlaw is seeking revenge in the afterlife.

episodes.name: Vigilante Vengeance
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers are in uncharted territory as they head to Montana for the first time to investigate the haunted streets of Virginia City, a Wild West town known for its excessive crime and mass hangings.

episodes.name: Five Miles From Hell
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers head west to investigate haunted Port Townsend, Washington. A history of crimes, curses and broken dreams have left behind dark and angry spirits who are ready to confront the team.

episodes.name: Darkness in the Underworld
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers head to Pendleton, Oregon, a forgotten town with a sordid past and a secret kept hidden underground for over a century. To uncover the darkness, the team navigates a maze of tunnels that lead to a mysterious underworld.

episodes.name: Wrath of the Fire Goddess
episodes.overview: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers experience unimaginable terror as they investigate the town of Hilo, Hawaii. Voices in underground lava tubes warn of impending danger on the Big Island, giving the team a new respect for the vengeful fire goddess Pele.
